short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Detects emotions in text and highlights them with color. Enter your OpenAI API key on the Options page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Detects emotions (happy, angry, sad, disgusted, afraid and flirty) in text and highlights them with color.
